Uses of Class
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.FTPConnectionMetadata

  • Packages that use FTPConnectionMetadata 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp
    FTP (File Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.file
    Filesystem-based FTP handler implementations.

    • Uses of FTPConnectionMetadata in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp

      Methods in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp that return FTPConnectionMetadata 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      FTPConnectionMetadata FTPDataConnectionCoordinator.PendingTransfer.getMetadata()  
      Methods in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp with parameters of type FTPConnectionMetadata 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default FTPFileOperationResult FTPFileSystem.allocateSpace​(java.lang.String path, long size, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Allocates space for a file (optional operation).
      FTPAuthenticationResult FTPConnectionHandler.authenticate​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String account, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Handles FTP authentication (USER/PASS/ACCT command sequence).
      default boolean FTPConnectionHandler.canStore​(java.lang.String username, long bytesToStore, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Checks if storage of the specified size is allowed for the user.
      FTPFileSystem.DirectoryChangeResult FTPFileSystem.changeDirectory​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String currentDirectory, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Changes the current working directory.
      java.lang.String FTPConnectionHandler.connected​(FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Notifies that a new client connection has been established.
      FTPFileOperationResult FTPFileSystem.createDirectory​(java.lang.String path, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Creates a new directory.
      FTPFileOperationResult FTPFileSystem.deleteFile​(java.lang.String path, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Deletes a file.
      void FTPConnectionHandler.disconnected​(FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Notifies that the client connection has been closed.
      FTPFileSystem.UniqueNameResult FTPFileSystem.generateUniqueName​(java.lang.String basePath, java.lang.String suggestedName, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Generates a unique file name for store-unique operations.
      FTPFileInfo FTPFileSystem.getFileInfo​(java.lang.String path, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Gets information about a specific file or directory.
      FTPFileSystem FTPConnectionHandler.getFileSystem​(FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Provides the file system implementation for this connection.
      default Quota FTPConnectionHandler.getQuota​(java.lang.String username, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Gets the current quota status for a user.
      FTPFileOperationResult FTPConnectionHandler.handleSiteCommand​(java.lang.String command, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Handles SITE-specific commands.
      default boolean FTPConnectionHandler.isAuthorized​(FTPOperation operation, java.lang.String path, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Checks if the authenticated user is authorized to perform an operation.
      java.util.List<FTPFileInfo> FTPFileSystem.listDirectory​(java.lang.String path, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Lists the contents of a directory.
      java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel FTPFileSystem.openForReading​(java.lang.String path, long restartOffset, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Opens a file for reading (download) using NIO channels.
      java.nio.channels.WritableByteChannel FTPFileSystem.openForWriting​(java.lang.String path, boolean append, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Opens a file for writing (upload) using NIO channels.
      default void FTPConnectionHandler.recordBytesAdded​(java.lang.String username, long bytesAdded, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Records that bytes were added (after successful upload).
      default void FTPConnectionHandler.recordBytesRemoved​(java.lang.String username, long bytesRemoved, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Records that bytes were removed (after successful delete).
      FTPFileOperationResult FTPFileSystem.removeDirectory​(java.lang.String path, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Removes an empty directory.
      FTPFileOperationResult FTPFileSystem.rename​(java.lang.String fromPath, java.lang.String toPath, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Renames or moves a file or directory.
      void FTPConnectionHandler.transferCompleted​(java.lang.String path, boolean upload, long totalBytesTransferred, boolean success, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Called when a data transfer has completed.
      void FTPConnectionHandler.transferProgress​(java.lang.String path, boolean upload, java.nio.ByteBuffer data, long totalBytesTransferred, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Called during data transfer to provide transfer progress updates.
      void FTPConnectionHandler.transferStarting​(java.lang.String path, boolean upload, long size, FTPConnectionMetadata metadata)
      Called when a data transfer (upload/download) is starting.
